name: book-management-system
description: Book Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:shell:db: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U admin -d book_management
scripts.prod: ENVIRONMENT=prod BUILD_TARGET=production NODE_ENV=production docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up --build -d
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend pnpm run db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec backend pnpm run db:seed
scripts.test: docker-compose exec backend pnpm test && docker-compose exec frontend pnpm test
scripts.test:local: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.lint: docker-compose exec backend pnpm lint && docker-compose exec frontend pnpm lint
scripts.lint:local: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
